name: RUN (itch)
description:
THEY'RE AFTER YOU

Run.

Controls: [A] - left foot [D] - right foot [SPACE] - vault obstacle [ENTER] - restart on scorescreen (after death)

- Run (by putting one foot in front of the other) to escape

- Mash the left and right foot buttons to stay ahead of your pursuer, keep running!

- When your vision turns red, there's an obstacle in your path

- The longer you run the quicker you need to vault and move your feet

- Your score will be added up at the end of the game, before it restarts

This game was created for the bitjam gamejam, in which the screen was limited to having one color visible at a time.

Created by James Shipp for bitjam 2016
